name: Acid Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to acid, unlocking Poison Dart and Corrosive Spray.

name: Cannibalise
desc: Destroy an allied summon or totem. Receive their Vitality, Physical Armour and Magic Armour.

name: Conjure Incarnate
desc: Conjure a personal elemental that matches the ground surface it's summoned onto. Your incarnate can be buffed with Infusions. Once you hit Summoning ability level of 10, a colossal Incarnate Champion will answer your summons! The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability. Duration 10 turn(s).

name: Cursed Electric Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to cursed electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge and Closed Circuit.

name: Dimensional Bolt
desc: Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [X] of a random type, and then creates a corresponding surface.

name: Dominate Mind
desc: Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

name: Door to Eternity
desc: Give all summons around you a status that prevents them from dying to damage or disappearing when their life runs out. Sets Persisting for 2 turn(s).

name: Electric Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge.

name: Elemental Totem
desc: Target a ground surface and conjure a totem of the corresponding element. Each turn, this totem will fire a projectile at enemies in sight. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability. Duration 3 turn(s).

name: Ethereal Storm
desc: Unpredictable projectiles from distant planes strike target area, dealing random elemental damage to enemies or healing allies. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Farsight Infusion
desc: Unlock a ranged attack for your Incarnate. Provides [X] Magic Armour (amount depends on your level).

name: Fire Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to fire, unlocking Fireball.

name: Ice Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to blessed ice, unlocking Restoration and Healing Ritual.

name: Necrofire Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to necrofire, unlocking Fireball and Epidemic of Fire.

name: Planar Gateway
desc: Conjure two linked gateways that allow any character to instantly travel between them. Active for 10 turn(s).

name: Poison Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to poison, unlocking Poison Dart.

name: Power Infusion
desc: Unlock Whirlwind  and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [X] Physical Armour (amount depends on your level).

name: Rallying Cry
desc: Target character regenerates [X] Vitality and [X] Magic Armour according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.

name: Shadow Infusion
desc: Incarnate learns how to go invisible and strike foes with a corrosive slash. Unlocks skills equal in effect to Chameleon Cloak and Corrupted Blade.

name: Soul Mate
desc: Bind yourself to target character, copying any healing and Armour restoration that you receive to them. Clears Frozen, Stunned, Knocked Down and Petrified. Sets Soul Mate for e turn(s).

name: Summon Cat Familiar
desc: Summons a black cat by your side. Cat can leap, claw, and swap places with it's summoner.

name: Summon Condor
desc: Summons a condor that will aid you in combat. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Summon Dragonling
desc: Summons a newt to help you in combat. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Summon Inner Demon
desc: Conjure a demon that will share their Intelligence with you and provide [X] Magic Armour. Grants you power to terrify and protect yourself with demonic fists. Active for 3 turn(s).

name: Supercharger
desc: Target totem or summon deals 100% more base damage during its next turn, but then it dies. Sets Supercharged for 2 turn(s).

name: Warp Infusion
desc: Incarnate learns a teleport skill and a skill to swap places with its master. These skills are equivalent in effect to Tactical Retreat and the Black Cat summon's swap skill.

name: Water Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to water, unlocking Restoration.
